trans:
It‚Äôs my pleasure to meet you and I‚Äôm really happy to welcome you to our community! We have a big purpose: to make you live a career start just as you pictured it üòç
How about getting to know each other? Tell me about the professional areas in which you would like to build your career so I can suggest how to make the most of Joinrs to find the opportunities you are looking for!
I‚Äôll reveal two secrets to boost your research:
Download the app: it will suggest you, in real time, the most compatible ads with you.
Keep your preferences up to date: Joinrs is the only job search platform where it‚Äôs not just the company requirements that count, but your ambitions and preferences.
In fact, our artificial intelligence model, the Joinrs AI, was born to replace the usual long, often boring and complicated ads, giving each offer a score of 1 to 100 and showing you only the key information and compatibility with your preferences and company requirements.
Time is precious, use it to apply consciously!
